about_the_game:
Outfit for Dai based on the Hero from Dragon Quest III: The Seeds of Salvation.

*Available as a bonus item for purchasing the Standard Edition or Digital Deluxe Edition from 05/27/2023 – 10/12/2023.

content_descriptors.notes: Infinity Strash: DRAGON QUEST The Adventure of Dai contains fantasy violence, mild blood and mild language in certain areas of the game.

detailed_description:
Outfit for Dai based on the Hero from Dragon Quest III: The Seeds of Salvation.

*Available as a bonus item for purchasing the Standard Edition or Digital Deluxe Edition from 05/27/2023 – 10/12/2023.
